oopex2

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • oopex2.Account

  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    The Account represents a bank account which can make withdrawals, deposits, and calculate interest.
    Author:
    Nicholas Glenn

        Note: You cannot deposit a negative amount.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
